title: Lynda.com - DVD Studio Pro 4 Essential Training
description:
DVD Studio Pro 4 is part of the Final Cut Studio suite of applications by Apple <a href="
http://www.apple.com/finalcutstudio/overview.html" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.apple.com/finalcutstudio/overview.html</a>


Video Tutorial

DVD Studio Pro 4 Essential Training
with: Larry Jordan


DVD Studio Pro 4 Essential Training concentrates on the essential aspects of understanding, organizing, and creating a complete DVD project from start to finish. From preparing video, audio, and graphic assets, to creating simple and advanced buttons and indexes, instructor Larry Jordan shows how to create menus, build tracks, add slideshows and subtitles, work with HD media, and complete a project. Exercise files accompany the tutorials for premium subscribers.


Topics include:

Introduction
Getting Started
Planning Your DVD
Preparing Assets
Understanding the DVD Studio Pro Interface
Setup and Exporting
Creating a Simple DVD
Advanced Features
Advanced Buttons and Menus
Creating a Chapter Index Template
Working with Markers
Using Stories
Working with Subtitles
Scripting
Working with Multiple Tracks
DVD-ROM and DVD@CCESS
Working with 16x9 and HD Media
Conclusion


For more info (and video samples) please see: <a href=" http://movielibrary.lynda.com/html/modPage.asp?ID=464" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://movielibrary.lynda.com/html/modPage.asp?ID=464</a>

Enjoy!
